channel.title: University of Wisconsin (R-074)
channel.generator: Function write_rss() in R package nrcadams

item.title: Responds to NRC 790730 ltr requesting SNM inventory justification.Justification of 45-kg allotment & info re inventories for proposed fuel design change encl.
item.description: CORRESPONDENCE-LETTERS, EDUCATIONAL INSTITUTION TO NRC, INCOMING CORRESPONDENCE
item.author: MISSOURI, UNIV. OF, COLUMBIA, MO

item.title: Responds to 831007 ltr transmitting G Pollack rept re conversion of univ research reactors from high to low enriched U fuel.Time & funding constraints constitute major problems w/conversion.
item.description: CORRESPONDENCE-LETTERS, EDUCATIONAL INSTITUTION TO NRC, INCOMING CORRESPONDENCE
item.author: WISCONSIN, UNIV. OF, MADISON, WI

item.title: Expresses hope that Cashwell response to recipient ltr sufficient.Cashwell response received shortly before second Commissioner ltr.Ltrs assumed to have crossed in mail.
item.description: CORRESPONDENCE-LETTERS, EDUCATIONAL INSTITUTION TO NRC, INCOMING CORRESPONDENCE
item.author: WISCONSIN, UNIV. OF, MADISON, WI
